var siteAlerts = [{"id":3812,"title":"School Cancelled","body":"
The Carlstadt Public School will be closed effective March 16, 2020 until further notice.","dateStart":"2020-03-13T18:14:08Z","baseGroupName":"Carlstadt Public School","hash":"bXaOCLnw5MTYePo+A6iwaDZ68HSs9LgQmlfDvvtYtXc=","updateDate":"2020-03-13T18:14:08Z"}];

div.h3: Board Meeting changed to 1:00 pm for April 21, 2020

div.p: Please see that attachment from the Borough of Carlstadt regarding closures.

div.h3: Board Meeting Date and Time Change

div.p: The Board Meeting scheduled for Tuesday, March 17th at 7:00 pm is cancelled and rescheduled for Monday, March 16th at 6:00 pm.
Pre-to Grade 4 At-Home Learning PlanÂ (see attachment below)
GradeÂ 5- 8Â At-Home Learning PlanÂ (see attachment below)

Registration for 2020-2021 Pre-K and Kindergarten will take place on Tuesday, March 24, 2020 in the main lobby at Carlstadt Public School.Â You may pre-register through the "Quick Links" tab(click here) but please be aware that you are still required to complete the forms which are located under the "Parents" tabÂ (click here).Â Please contact the Main Office should you have any questions, 201-672-3000.Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â

div.p: Please see the attached Superintendent's newsletter.

div.h3: Notification of the Use of Pesticides on School Grounds

div.p: Notification of the Use of Pesticides on School Grounds
Please see attached notices for scheduled applications of pesticides to control crabgrass and broad-leaf weeds on school grounds.Â
